dependencies.name: uuid
dependencies.description: Util-linux is a suite of essential utilities for any Linux system.

dependent_to.name: subversion
dependent_to.description: Apache Subversion - an open source version control system.

dependent_to.name: serf
dependent_to.description:
Apache Serf - a high performance C-based HTTP client library built upon
the Apache Portable Runtime (APR) library

dependent_to.name: ganglia
dependent_to.description:
Ganglia is a scalable distributed monitoring system for high-performance
computing systems such as clusters and Grids. It is based on a
hierarchical design targeted at federations of clusters. Supports
clusters up to 2000 nodes in size.

dependent_to.name: httpd
dependent_to.description:
The Apache HTTP Server is a powerful and flexible HTTP/1.1 compliant web
server.

dependent_to.name: gpdb
dependent_to.description:
Greenplum Database (GPDB) is an advanced, fully featured, open source
data warehouse, based on PostgreSQL. It provides powerful and rapid
analytics on petabyte scale data volumes. Uniquely geared toward big
data analytics, Greenplum Database is powered by the world's most
advanced cost-based query optimizer delivering high analytical query
performance on large data volumes.

dependent_to.name: libapreq2
dependent_to.description:
httpd-apreq is subproject of the Apache HTTP Server Project whose
committers develop and maintain the libapreq C library and its language
bindings for Perl (contributions for additional language bindings are
most welcome).
